en: Erik Dobell Wakes Up to the Fire

Master mentalist and magician Erik Dobell woke up from a nap to flickering lights.when he opened his front door what he saw wasn't an illusion. "I opened the front door and everything was on fire. It looked like cartoon hell," Dobell grabbed money, his laptop, and a photo album and got out. "There wasn't time to think. He headed down ski mountain road. The car was hot and he thought the tires would melt. He was fortunate,"The fire stopped at my driveway. My apartment was spared." WHile he had nightmares afterward, he couldn't say enough nice things about the fire department.
